# Data Source: aws_networkmanager_sites

Provides details about existing Network Manager sites.

## Example Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { DataAwsNetworkmanagerSites } from "./.gen/providers/aws/data-aws-networkmanager-sites";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    new DataAwsNetworkmanagerSites(this, "example", {
      globalNetworkId: globalNetworkId.stringValue,
      tags: {
        Env: "test",
      },
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

This data source supports the following arguments:

* `globalNetworkId` - (Required) ID of the Global Network of the sites to retrieve.
* `tags` - (Optional) Restricts the list to the sites with these tags.

## Attribute Reference

This data source exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

* `ids` - IDs of the sites.
